Phillip Ockinga (born ) is an American college football coach. He was the head football coach for Peru State College, a position he held from 2022 until his firing in 2025. He also coached for Hastings, Fort Hays State, FIU, Hutchinson, Western Illinois, and South Dakota. He played college football for Wyoming and Hastings.
